name: Marcin Karol Kotlinski
profile_summary:
Results-driven Senior Backend Engineer with 8 years of experience in designing and developing scalable backend solutions. Proficient in **Java**, **Spring Boot**, and API development, with a strong command of **AWS** and **CDK** for cloud services integration. Experienced in both **SQL** and **NoSQL** databases, leveraging data for optimal system performance. I excel in Test Driven Development (TDD) practices, ensuring high-quality code through rigorous testing. 
My background also includes robust collaboration skills, enhancing teamwork and project outcomes through effective communication. I bring expertise in **Python** and familiarity with full-stack technologies, enabling a comprehensive understanding of system architecture and functionality. I have successfully led projects that adhere to best practices in documentation and compliance.
